DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male nonpregnant , nonlactating healthy female 2 . Body mass index 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 3 . Must willing able communicate participate whole study 4 . Must provide write informed consent 5 . Must agree use adequate method contraception 6 . In condition general good health , base upon result medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory profile 12lead ECG 1 . Participation clinical research study within previous 3 month absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion ( ADME ) study within previous 12 month 2 . History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year current smoker smoke within last 12 month positive cotinine urine test screen admission 3 . Radiation exposure , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year . No occupationally expose worker , define Ionising Radiation Regulations 1999 , shall participate study 4 . Positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C virus antibody ( HCV Ab ) human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) result 5 . Donation loss great 550 mL blood ( include plasmapheresis ) receipt transfusion blood product within previous 8 week 6 . Subjects take , take , prescribed overthecounter drug herbal remedy within 14 day drug injection ( include vaccine ) within 30 day within 10 halflives respective medication , whichever longer , Investigational Medical Product ( IMP ) administration
